page.title: 01 A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30 and have{breakfast}of cereal,toast and butter. I get dressed and at 8.30,my mum or my Auntie Sue take me by car to {school}.We go in the hall at 9.00 for prayers. We do tables test and some Maths and we go out to play at 10.30 to run about. We go back inside and as the day goes on it comes to 3.15 when I return home. If the weather is bright,I go to the beach at L'Eree to have a swim in the sea. If it is less sunny I go to look at the{German {bunkers}by the slipway on L'Eree beach,they are damp and dirty now but put up during the German occupation. I live just across the road from the beach so I can go whenever I like. On L'Eree beach I enjoy making holes in the sand or playing on the{drainage {pipe}.Sometimes I go fishing with my dad in his boat. By {Hayley Piriou }
